ygData.subject: Re: Diamond
ygData.msgSnippet: Diamond:: She transformed into bot and stood up, leaning against the wall for support.  She was an assassin, not a muscled warrior.  Oh yeah, that s rich. You

Diamond::

She transformed into bot and stood up, leaning against the wall for 
support.  She was an assassin, not a muscled warrior.  "Oh yeah, 
that's rich. You don't want to hurt me, you just want to kill me. I'm 
not ready to meet the matrix yet.  I escaped from the Predacon 
council, and I'll get out of here." she looked and hoped she would 
find something.  She looked out into the middle of the cargo bay and 
found just what she was looking for.  A small floor drain.  The last 
place that they would think to find her and with luck, it would lead 
outside.  She transformed into rattle snake and slithered towards the 
drain.  She had a little trouble pulling the cover off the drain, but 
kept talking to cover up audiably waht she was doing and hopefully 
buy enough time for her to get away.  "You know, if things had been 
different, I think I could have fallen for a bot like you.  I like 
you.  Your as efficiant a killer as I.  Had we met up on Cybertron, I 
think we might have made quite a pair."  She almost had the cover off.
"Yeah, it's a shame that you want me dead so badly. I think we could 
have made a good team." A little more and the cover would be off.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer nods, looking from Catgut to Threadshot. "I got a lock 
on 'er, she 
> ain't gettin' away."
> 
> He glances at his scanner, "Allright, I'll take care of her. 
There's a battle 
> going on not far from here, if you guys want some action, you can 
go join. 
> Don' let the femm out though! Make sure to close blast doors behind 
ya."
> 
> He runs off down a hallway, slowing down as he approaches the cargo 
hold. 
> Blast doors were closing behind him as he walked, and the same 
thing was 
> happening at the cargo hold's end.
> 
> Gun out, DevilDuer walks forward, ready for battle.
> 
> "Hey, I don't wanna hurt ya," he yells to the hallway, "Just come 
out 
> peacefully, you'll be allright."
